results.content: Excellent overview of the main lodash utility functions.  It is by no means a complete reference on this library, as this is a "Rapid" course.  But, it does exactly what is expected from this type of tutorial:  A quick introduction to some of the most commonly used features of the library to help the viewer decide if lodash can help in their development workflow.  The only thing to keep in mind is that this course was made before the new version of the JavaScript spec (ES6/ES2015) has become more common.  This means that some of the utility functions in lodash have lost some of their appeal due to some new syntactic sugar provided by ES6/ES2015 that was inspired by libraries like lodash and that are now available natively in JavaScript (which can improve performance once the browsers and other runtime environments like Node.js fully support ES6/ES2015).  Nevertheless, there is way more to lodash that is not integrated in even the latest JavaScript spec so the library will continue to evolve and remain very useful.  This course is a very quick way to evaluate the potential of using lodash in your coding workflow.

results.content: The class is awesome! The only thing that would make it better is if it was slightly updated to a more recent version of lodash. Everything else is great, the instructor is very clear and it's not hard to get updates on the library
